metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13006 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The L2TP parser in tcpdump before 4.9.2 has a buffer over-read inprint-l2tp.c, several functions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13006` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
